name: L.E.M.
description:
L.E.M aka Limitless Element Manipulator is a short 2D platformer game, made as a university project, some things will be unpolished/buggy, but I hope you can still enjoy it.

Be warned - Boss fights may be unfair.

Controls:

W / Space - Jump

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Shift - Dash

1, 2, 3, 4 - Elements

G - Shoot

H - Shield
